name: ArXiv
description: Enables efficient search, exploration, and comparison of arXiv.org research papers. Accesses detailed paper metadata, performs keyword and author-based searches, and generates prompts for summarization and comparison.

operations.name: Scrape Recent Category Papers
operations.description: [Crawling] Scrape the ‘recent’ page of a specified category to retrieve a list of the latest papers.

operations.name: Get Paper Info
operations.description: Retrieve detailed information given a paper ID.

operations.name: Analyze Trends
operations.description: Analyze the latest trends in a specified category.
